Amazon Review Scraper – Extract and Export Amazon Reviews with Ease!

The Amazon Review Scraper is a simple Chrome extension that allows users to scrape and export product reviews from Amazon effortlessly. Whether you're conducting market research, analyzing customer feedback, or just curious about product reviews, this tool helps you quickly gather review data in a clean and structured format.

Key Features:
--Scrape Amazon Reviews: Automatically capture star ratings, reviewer names, review titles, review content, and review dates.
--Handles Reviews with Videos: Seamlessly extracts the textual review content even when video reviews are present.
--Clean CSV Export: Export all review data into a neatly formatted CSV file, ready for use in spreadsheets or analysis tools.
--Accurate Date Formatting: Review dates are automatically formatted in short-date format for ease of use in Excel.
--No Clutter: Removes unnecessary data, keeping only the essential review content for your analysis.

HOW TO USE:
1. Install the Extension: Add the Amazon Review Scraper to your Chrome browser.
2. Go to an Amazon Product Page: Navigate to the product page whose reviews you want to scrape.
3. Scroll to the Bottom of Reviews: Scroll to the bottom of the review section and click on the "See more reviews" link.
4. Filter Reviews by Star Rating: Select the "All stars" filter and choose 5 stars only, 4 stars only, etc., to scrape up to 100 reviews per star rating due to Amazon's product listing page limitations.
5. Open the Extension: Click on the Amazon Review Scraper icon in your Chrome toolbar.
6. Start Scraping: Click the "Start Scraping" button. The extension will begin capturing all available reviews.
7. Download the Data: Once the scraping is complete, a CSV file containing the reviews will be automatically downloaded.
8. Analyze the Data: Open the CSV file in Excel or your preferred spreadsheet tool. Review data such as star ratings, reviewer names, review titles, content, and dates will be available in separate columns.

NOTES:
--This extension currently supports reviews in English from Amazon.com.
--Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with Amazon in any way. This extension is an independent tool created solely for the purpose of making review data extraction easier for users.
